data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 3,263,625 who are far from you in Rivers, Nigeria from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Rivers, Nigeria

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Rivers, Nigeria.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Rivers, Nigeria.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Rivers to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the state of Rivers that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Rivers to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Rivers, Nigeria to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 4,965,827 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.section_summary:
the state of Rivers, Nigeria has a population of 6,689,100.

We estimate Rivers has 1,723,273 people who might know Jesus, 1,702,202 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 3,263,625 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

location.name: Rivers
location.cities_list: Port Harcourt, Buguma, Okrika, Obonoma, Elele
location.cities_list_w_pop: Port Harcourt (1,865,000), Buguma (135,404), Okrika (133,271), Obonoma (68,584), Elele (20,620)
